attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The DCMS recently cut funding to the Arts Council by £30 million. The government need to increase funding in this area to make up for the cut and ensure that they are using our tax money to give oppurtunity in terms of career paths and audience access to all!

The Arts, always under funded, are increasingly becoming elistist pursuits. We need funding for theatre, dance, music and literature, so that all are given the oppurtunity to create and view work made. So that all have access to our rich cultural heritage.
Feed our souls. Save the Arts.

rejection.details: Your claim about the cut in arts funding is unsubstantiated.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
